1482500.name: Build Fight Game
1482500.description:
Build Fight Game is a class-based shooter set across a collection of fully interactable voxel environments. Create, destroy, and shoot your way to victory with your team in procedurally-generated multiplayer maps!

Choose your fighter

Pick from one of three classes that best suits your gameplay style:

  • Recon:
    Low health, but fast and agile with a high powered shotgun and rapid tunnel-digging shovel. A good Recon can leverage their movement and firepower to make up for their low HP and come out on top even against the toughest opponents, all while digging strategic routes with their shovel to assist their team.

  • Construction: Able to build complex schematics, Construction players massively enhance their team's defences. They are equipped with a special hybrid sniper/assault rifle: the sniper mode can be devastating at long range to players that let their guard down, while the assault rifle mode is vital to staying alive in a pinch.

  • Destruction:
    High HP and low mobility, Destruction players are an explosive powerhouse with a grenade launcher and throwable dynamite. No defence is strong enough to stop their wrath, and any player caught off guard will be quickly turned to gibs.

Prepare your defences

Create key strategic pathways and hidden tunnels as Recon, build bases for your team as Construction, and ready yourself for the battle...

Battle

Engage in tense matchups against your enemies. The best players must use every tool at their disposal to come out on top in fights, even if the odds are stacked against them.

Win.

Collect gold from foes that you defeat and take it to your vault! The team with the most gold in their vault at the end of the match wins - but be careful not to let the enemies in, lest they take your gold from right under your nose!

Features

  • Proximity-based voice chat.

  • Fully interactable procedurally generated voxel-based maps.

  • Customizable map settings: change terrain generation, structures, and more. Mould the battlefield to your specifications!

  • Three distinct player classes.

  • Team-based gameplay.

  • Unique gameplay loop based around collecting and depositing gold, tailored specifically to the unpredictability of the game's procedurally generated maps.

  • Support for teams of all sizes: play in hectic 50v50 matches, or just with a few friends.
